DOC.brief_summary: The first purpose compare difference leg press exercise ( LPE ) additional hip abductor external rotator muscle strength training leg press exercise ( LPE+HAE ) muscle strength , hip kinematics step , pain severity function patient diagnose patellofemoral pain syndrome . The second one discover relationship change muscle strength performance difference hip joint kinematics post treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Hip Abductor External Rotator Strength Training Patients With Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Patellofemoral pain syndrome ( Bilateral unilateral ) Special test : crepitus compression test , patellar grind test ( Clarke 's sign ) , pain compression test , palpation ( least 2 ) Below 50 year old Pain : long sitting , up/down stair , squat , kneel , run & jumping ( least 2 ) Pain duration least 1 month At least 1 item PSS score 3 cm Knee operation Central peripheral neurological deficit Obvious knee joint low extremity malalignment People involve competitive sport PSS subscale pain experience last week 8cm Have take antiinflammatory drug , receive antiinflammatory injection receive therapy past 3 month
